Pick up and Return in Store

You can enjoy complimentary in-store pick up and return for items purchased on Stoneisland.com.
Select the Pick up in Store option in the Delivery Details section at Checkout and choose the store you want the items delivered to with Complimentary Express Shipping.
You will receive an email as soon as your order is available for pick up.

If you wish to return in store items purchased online, ensure they are in the same condition that you received them in, with all labels and packaging, and place them in the original box. Take them to one of our stores along with the shipping note and the pre-printed label that came in the package.

Find out more in the Customer Care‎‎ area. For more information, refer to the Return Policy‎‎.
